resources.string:
The most important measure in the energy balance of Sri Lanka is the total consumption of 11.72 billion kWh per year. Beacon is the best tool to monitor your daily electricity consumption and conserve energy. Using Beacon we are able to

	Record Daily Electricity Consumption 
	Record Monthly Electricity Consumption
	Calculate Electricity Bill
	Automate Beacon using Threshold Unit
	Analyze Consumption Summery using Graphs
